title: Training Program for the Design and Operation of a Congenital Hypothyroidism Management System

context.prior_knowledge: Basics of medical information systems and fundamental database management principles
context.additional_context: Course for managers/leaders in corporate medical data departments: Smartphone-based learning and practical training in limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Explain the instructional system design process according to the five phases of the ADDIE model.
Develop a standardized protocol for collecting patient data on congenital hypothyroidism.
Design a relational database structure (tables, role assignments).
Apply system verification methods using user experience evaluation tools.
Establish operational procedures for a web-based patient information recording system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
